channel.title: Basic yell command for delta
channel.description:
can someone give me a basic yell command for deltascape
just one that any player rights may use.

item.title: Basic yell command for delta
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

If its double you probobly have this command somewhere else no?

Read full topic

item.title: Basic yell command for delta
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

String[] rights = {"[Player]","[Moderator]","[Owner]"}; if(command.startsWith("yell")) { String msg = command.substring(5); String titles = rights[playerRights]; yell(titles+" "+playerName+": "+msg); }

Read full topic

item.title: Basic yell command for delta
item.dc:creator: @sinzscapeserver sinzscapeserver
item.description:
@sinzscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:2, topic:514138”]I don’t really use delta but tell me if this is good:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(!muted) {
switch(playerRights) {
case 0:
yell("" + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;

case 1:
yell("[Mod] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;

case 2:
yell("[Admin] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;
}
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dyllan”)) {
yell("[The Boss] Dyllan - " + command.substring(5));
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Excorsist”)) {
yell("[Developer] Excorsist - " + command.substring(5));
}
if(muted) {
sM(“You are muted and cannot yell”);
return;
}
}[/code][/quote]
it seems like the text doubles
for example

Read full topic

item.title: Basic yell command for delta
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

I don’t really use delta but tell me if this is good:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if(!muted) {
switch(playerRights) {
case 0:
yell("" + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;

case 1:
yell("[Mod] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;

case 2:
yell("[Admin] " + playerName + " - " + command.substring(5));
break;
}
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dyllan”)) {
yell("[The Boss] Dyllan - " + command.substring(5));
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Excorsist”)) {
yell("[Developer] Excorsist - " + command.substring(5));
}
if(muted) {
sM(“You are muted and cannot yell”);
return;
}
}[/code]
